about_the_game:
The Demo to "Critical Zone"




Four rulers on an unconquered planet - that can't be good in the long run.



In this local couch multiplayer, you and up to three friends take on the role of a ruler with the goal of pushing the others off the planet and finally getting control over it.

This demo takes place on Earth, but there’s more waiting for you in the full version:
Each planet of our solar system reacts differently during your fight. On Uranus it gets a little cold from time to time, whereas the sun makes you sweat.

Also in the full version:
  • Choose from over 20 historically influential personalities.
  • Fight on 11 planets of our solar system.
  • Become the number one ruler in your living room.

short_description: Until now, the planets of our solar system float peacefully through space. Take on the role of a ruler and fight for control over the planets of our solar system with up to three other friends in this local couch multiplayer.
